author: awiner
msg: - For "safe" template libraries, bypass sanitization of content (it was already bypassed for script and CSS resources)
- Support template libraries using custom tag instances
- Move OSML-loading code out of TemplateRewriter and into its own class

author: awiner
msg: Small logging improvements to a couple of logging hooks:
- Use parameter substitution instead of string assembly
- Add the gadget URL to caught ELExceptions during template processing

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-260: Weird transitive dependencies from commons-logging
Fixed the weird dependencies by upgrading to commons-logging 1.1.1

author: bluk
msg: Use HttpServlet*Wrapper to comply w/ Servlet spec
